p: Additional DENV-2 envelope (E) gene region nested RT-PCR was done for selected samples. The RT step was done using Maxima reverse transcriptase, random hexamers and RiboLock RNase inhibitor following the manufacturer’s instructions. The PCR steps were done using DreamTaq DNA polymerase (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, USA) using DENV-2 E-gene specific primers: first round forward primer 5′-CATGGATGTCATCAGAAGGG-3′, first round reverse primer 5′-CCTTTRATGTCTCCT GTCAT-3′, second round forward primer 5′-GGRTYYTGAGACATCCAGG-3′ and second round reverse primer 5′-TCTGRTGTTATYTGTTTCCAC-3′.
